attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We suggest that the minimum wage should cater for people to be encouraged to learn while they work and on achieving certificates employers be allowed to pay more. Also for a fairer system which takes back into account people working unsocial hours and being allowed to claim back travel expences which employers with hold from small wages. It should also have a steping system for longer periods of working passed 1 year 2 years etc., in order to encourage peole plus employers to make a job more satisfying in many different ways plus make working more exciting than receiving benefits all the time.
